lithium.community.android.sdk.rest

Class LiAuthRestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • lithium.community.android.sdk.rest.LiAuthRestClient

  • public class LiAuthRestClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This client is used for catering to Authorization request. Created by saiteja.tokala on 12/2/16.
